chapters.title: Chapter 38: Maidens of the Spear
chapters.info: Bain, p. 434 (347)—Aiel of the Black Rock sept of the Shaarad Aiel. Her hair is flame-colored. She became Chiad's first sister—the two had to sneak through the camp of the other to the Wise Ones because their clans were (and still are) in blood feud. See also Chiad.
